archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0190
archimate:Requirement.documentation:
As a Privacy, Fraud and Compliance Representative I want access to a Fraud Management Capability within a group/role locked down access So I can view and edit the database as required
Acceptance Criteria: Given I have access to the Fraud Management Capability When I access the capability Then: 1) I can view records in the Fraud Management Capability including a unique Fraud ID per fraud order transaction 2) I can manually add a record in the Fraud Management Capability 3) I can manually update a record in the Fraud Management Capability 4) I can manually delete a record in the Fraud Management Capability 5) I can maintain records of blacklisted fields: email address, contact names, IP address, contact number, service address, delivery address, billing address and addresses that the DOT fraud rules can use in identifying fraudulent orders

properties.value: Is the "Fraud Management Capability" a system outside of Comarch?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
